The summer school takes place at the FADU (Faculdad de Architectura, Diseño y Urbanismo, UBA) in Buenos Aires, Argentina from 30.9.-11.10.2024. The study trip is dedicated to investigate how urban mobility influences and changes urban space. The aim is to reflect and develop ideas for urban and traffic planning concepts that meet current mobility requirements, make the urban space livable and, in particular, take aspects such as safety, gender equality and the consideration of informal practices into account. Students from TU Berlin together with UBA students will work on a specific project/ location in Buenos Aires and will have the possibility to take part in the Bienal de Arquitectura in Buenos Aires (9.-13.10.24).
To show a first interest please sign up here on ISIS!
